title: God Dies by the Nile and Other Novels
description: Collected for the first time in one complete volume, God Dies by the Nile and other Novels are three of El Saadawiâ€™s most remarkable tales of tragedy, revenge, despair, and violence. Powerful and moving, El Saadawi masterfully captures the personal struggles of women in a society steeped in hypocrisy and reveals the daily revolt of women against the corrupt norms of the Arab world.
author: Nawal El Saadawi
